version_description:
Your very own personalised Sleep Coach is here with additional features. You can create live wallpapers from your favourite scenes and you can change the playback speed of the narrations.

A quiet mind is an absolute prerequisite for getting a good night's sleep. Unwind and disconnect your mind with the sound of waterfalls, or as you find yourself wandering the mountains. Plenty of bedtime stories and sleep meditations are waiting for you, each guided by fantastic voices. Our tailor-made library of carefully selected sounds will allow you to compose your very own, personal Sleep mix.

Follow us on Instagram @sleepapp and have a good night!

We listened to your feedback. From now you can set your bedtime reminder in AM/PM format, and you can search for sounds and stories by simply swiping down.

Enjoy and follow us on Instagram @sleepapp.

Enjoy and follow us on Instagram @sleepapp.

Hello Sleepers!

While the quality of your sleep keeps improving, we also work to make the app better every day. This version comes with bug fixes and improvements!

Enjoy and follow us on Instagram @sleepapp.

Hello Sleepers!
We added a bunch of new rain sounds. It's fascinating how varied rain can be. Rain on concrete, summer rain, rain on lake, rain on leaves? We got you covered!
We have great news for our Italian friends as well. The app is now available in Italian. Go meet our narrators and ease off by listening to their soothing stories.
Enjoy and follow us on Instagram @sleepapp.

Enjoy and follow us on Instagram @sleepapp.
